summary: A variable construct is used to represent a local variable.
details: The name is a sequence of letters, digits, underscores, and/or dollar signs.
The name cannot start with a digit.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    # Here are some example variables. %0A    var age = 0;%0A    var Tree = 0;%0A    var _submarine = 0;%0A    var ZipCode = 0;%0A    var state17 = 0;%0A}
